title: Festka Scout custom carbon gravel bike fills in the details for adventure
content:
Back in early August Festka teased us with their new Scout gravel bike, an evolution of their Czech-made custom carbon road One & all-road Rover frames, now built for bigger adventures. Developed for riding rougher terrain and heading out on bikepacking trips, the new Scout is more of a pure off-r0ad gravel bike with geometry,

The post Festka Scout custom carbon gravel bike fills in the details for adventure appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
